alert.note: Alert for Dunn; McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWEST DUNN AND SOUTHEAST MCKENZIE COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Theodore Roosevelt National Park North Unit, or 11 miles southeast of Watford City, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Theodore Roosevelt National Park North Unit and Johnsons Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
